definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
the official residence of Confucius' descendants at Qufu 曲阜, Shandong

sentences.english: Loyalty nation the masculine mansion scenery remain, yet host, Lin Ping Zi, isn't at home.
sentences.chinese: 忠国公府景物依旧，主人林平子却不在家。

definition: crown prince/heir of a noble house
the Zhou family (household, firm etc)/Jow-Ga Kung Fu - Martial Art
family of a functionary (i.e. educated middle class in Qing times)
